name: Ghost Council Debate
description: Triggers when player asks for puzzle hints - all 5 ghost agents debate in real-time

action.message: The player needs help with the current puzzle. Invoke all 5 ghost agents (Elara, Harlan, Mira, Theo, Selene) to debate the best hint. Each agent should respond based on their unique personality and MCP capabilities. Show the full debate transcript, then provide consensus.
